section.heading: Territorial application.
section.text: Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, this chapter applies to:

para.text: Affairs and estates of a disappeared individual who is domiciled in the District and an individual to be protected who is domiciled in the District;
Property located in the District of a non-domiciliary who is a disappeared individual or an individual to be protected;
Property coming into the control of a guardian or conservator who is subject to the laws of the District; and
An incapacitated individual in the District.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 1-301 of the Uniform Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Act (1982 Act).
